collectionMetadata.name: Statistics on private schools registered with MOE
collectionMetadata.description:
1) The figures include only private schools registered with MOE.
2) Privately-Funded Schools (PFS) offer education at the secondary and/or junior college levels and are aimed primarily at Singapore residents who may prefer an alternative curriculum and qualification.
3) The figures include only government-funded special education schools.
4) Private kindergartens are not included in these tables.

datasetMetadata.name: Statistics on Private Schools (Student Enrolment and Number of Teaching Staff)
datasetMetadata.description:
(1) Privately-Funded Schools offer education at the secondary and/or junior college levels and are aimed primarily at Singapore residents who may prefer an alternative curriculum and qualification.		
			
(2) The figures for Special Education Schools include only those that are government funded.

(2) The figures for Special Education Schools include only those that are government funded.
